itha wadagath washayen, ratehi apramana janawargika kandayam athara ediriwadi swarupayan brithanya palanaya thuladi ismathuwa paminiyaha. 1948di nidahasen pasuwa, thawamath wisandi nomathi boho kal sita bawathina siwil yuddha athurin ekak ha rata weli pawathiyi. 1962 patan wiwidha muhunuwara gath hamuda palanayan yatathe rata pawathi athara, ee hethuwa nisama lokaye ithamath aduwen sanwardhitha jathin athurin ekak bawata eya path wi atha.

shri lanka guwan hamudawen kridikawan thidenaku shri lanka netbol pilata athulathwa sitithi.pasal sisuwiyan lesa kolambaa wishakha widuhale thisala algama, gayani disanayaka ha mahanuwara usas balika widuhale gayanjali amarawansha jathika netbol pilata krida karathi.neshan kap netbol tharagawaliya desambar 1sita 7wanida dakwa pawathwena athara shri lankawa samaga papuwa niwgini, ayarlanthaya, singappuruwa, ugandawa ha amerikawa tharaga wadithi.singappuru yana shri lanka netbol pila meseya.marisha pranandu (nayika), semini alwis (upanayikawa), thisala algama, kanchana jayawira, tharjani siwalingam, thilini waththegedara, gayanjali amarawansha, surekha kumari, gayani disanayaka, chathurangani malkanthi, chapa galappaththi, darshika abewikrama athireka - nawujali rajapaksha, samanthi nilushika, shalika erangani.niladharin- wiktoriya lakshmi (kalamanakaru), somitha da alwis (puhunukaru), lal eekanayaka (waidya), di.en.prasadi (prathamika niladharini).
- methana lassanayi.
